channel.title: Shop exception 2nd post please help
channel.description:
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -70 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20652) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19512) at client.packetSending(client.java:19481) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:88) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
every time when i click "trade" on a certain npc i get this error this isn't for all npcs though
